KMS (short for Key Management Server) is an activation method used for activating multiple Windows installations. The key is installed (its a legitimate KMS key) and activated by the server, just as if Microsoft's own activation servers had done so.

WORKING MAK KEY FOR WINDOWS 8 PRO
M7KDN-HYPK9-RXBVK-MKJ2K-HCBQP
Mine says only activated till May 17, 2013
KMS will only activate for up to six months. After that time, activation is renewed for another six months

PERMANENT ACTIVATION:

Once you activate via KMS, simply go to http://windows.microsoft.com/en-US/windows-8/feature-packs to get Windows Media Center. After you get your key, simply go to Add Features to Windows 8. Click "I already have my product key" and input the key Microsoft has provided you. This REPLACES your KMS key, removing the need to activate every six months. You will have a permanent activation of Windows 8 afterwards.
